name: Psychic Crush II
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Occult Adventures © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text: This functions as psychic crush I, but on a successful Fortitude save, the target takes 5d6 points of damage + 1 point of damage per caster level. In addition, the target receives a +4 circumstance bonus on the Fortitude save only if it is at full hit points; otherwise, it gains a +2 bonus if it has more than half its total hit points remaining. This spell can be undercast.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同心灵碾压 I（Psychic Crush I）一般，不过成功通过强韧豁免时，目标会受到5d6 + 每施法者等级1点伤害。此外，目标仅在生命值全满的时候于强韧豁免中获得+4环境加值；剩余的总生命值在半额以上时仅会获得+2环境加值。该法术可以被降阶施法。
